profile:
Rick Appliance Repair is a family business in the GTA. We at Rick Appliance Repair specialize in repairs and services to all make and models for major leading brand names of domestic home appliances. 

Feel Free to email us any time at acappliancetech@gmail.com or rickappliances@gmail.com

We have built our reputation on word of mouth and pride ourselves on the long term relationships we've built with each and everyone of our customer's.

We are not just a company that carries out repairs, we are passionate and we value and understand the needs of our customer’s requirements. We never give up on repairing any appliance unless we know we have tried everything possible and we make sure at the end we guarantee to have a pleased customer.

We are fast and efficient, ensuring the best service and customer satisfaction. Servicing Toronto and surrounding area since 1989.

profile:
FIX Appliances CA believes everyone deserves high-quality and reliable home appliance repair service, and we’re proud to provide that to residents of the GTA and southern Ontario. 

Professional Expertise
 
Locally owned and operated, we expertly service over 30 brands of refrigerators, stoves, washers, dryers, dishwashers, range hoods and other household appliances utilizing the skills of a quality team of trained, professional appliance repair technicians. Each specialist is fully licensed and holds public liability insurance for your peace of mind.
 
Satisfaction Guaranteed
 
With over 15 years of repair experience, FIX Appliances CA has earned a high level of customer satisfaction and loyalty by delivering superior in-home service. When you contact us for your household appliance repairs, we’re sure you’ll join our growing list of satisfied customers and be pleased to refer us to your family and friends.
 
High-Quality Parts and Service
 
We are known in the community for using high-quality parts, so all our repairs are dependable and long-lasting. In addition, all our services are backed by comprehensive parts and labour warranties, so you’ll always be assured of receiving the best possible products and workmanship. Backed by an excellent support staff and trucks fully equipped with the latest technology, equipment and parts, our technicians will do their best to complete your appliance repair in one service call.
products: Fix Appliances CA ™ is providing Residential Home appliances Repair and Installation services on client side.
services: TSSA licensed to repair and installation of Gas, Electric and Induction appliances, including refrigerators, wine coolers, freezers, dishwashers, washers, dryers, stoves, ovens, cooktops, ranges, microwaves, top range hoods, outdoor gas grills and more. Residential and Commercial.
brands: Fix Appliances CA ™ is authorized repair service for most home appliance manufacturers. profile:
Elite Appliance has been servicing home owners, appliance manufacturers and property management firms in Ontario for over 21 years. A combination of expertise, passion and a sense for great customer care has led the company to grow from its initial 2 employees to well over 50 while expanding from our original location in Toronto to a second location in Oakville, a third in Ottawa and now our fourth location in London Ontario. Elite Appliance has rapidly become the #1 appliance repair service in the Ontario, earning itself multiple awards for excellence in service from multiple appliance manufacturers.

All our Technicians are all Factory trained and certified by all major appliance manufacturers to perform warranty and COD repairs, when choosing an appliance servicer, protect your valuable appliances and ensure the company you hire is authorized and trained by the manufacturer of your appliance. Working closely with appliance manufacturers we have become the Largest independent Servicer in Ontario and the Choice of Consumers when it comes to Appliance Repair. We have quickly built an outstanding reputation for our professionalism and honesty. Our mandate has always been the same: to deliver ELITE services at competitive prices, promptly and to our customers complete satisfaction.

profile:
Hello and welcome to Repair Care! Thank you for considering us for your appliance repair needs. As homeowners ourselves we know how stressful it can be when something we depend on isn't in working order. As such, we want to be part of the solution and not add to the problem. At RepairCare strive to be fair, professional and ethical at all times, keeping customer service at the forefront of all we do. We are committed to providing a high level of quality service we can stand behind. Thank you for choosing RepairCare. We appreciate your business.

We are proud of our mission statement:
We Strive to be: FAIR PROFESSIONAL & ETHICAL, Keeping CUSTOMER SERVICE at the forefront of all that we do! going ABOVE & BEYOND when we can. Sometimes we don’t get It RIGHT but we are committed to making It RIGHT!

profile:
We are committed to providing an excellent service across Toronto, GTA and nearby regions. In our decade of experience, we have learned that you can get your appliance, HVAC, electrical and plumbing issues repaired quickly, effectively, and relatively inexpensively. Our specialty is to provide quick solutions to all your appliance, plumbing, HVAC and electrical repairs and to achieve the highest possible customer satisfaction from our services. Our punctual and friendly staff will always provide budget-friendly repairs.

WHY DO OUR CUSTOMERS LOVE US?
"Slow is smooth, smooth is fast." This is our motto because we take exceptional care in locating your appliance and plumbing faults to have them fixed within the shortest possible period. We encourage our customers to watch us as we perform the repair and to ask as many questions as possible while we are on site. This will ensure the best service on the market because you will be educated on all of your appliances at no extra cost.
Man With a Wrench always provides an above and beyond service because we do not simply tackle the problem at hand. We also find its underlying cause. Most importantly, we provide our customers with education as to how to prevent such problems from occurring in the future. Our budget-friendly repairs are second to none and we will provide you with quick solutions to all of your appliance repair needs. Our goal is to delight you with our service. If you don’t go shouting from the rooftops how happy you are with your service following a work order, we will be very disappointed, for our business runs on word-of-mouth referrals and we strive to ensure you’re happy enough to tell your friends about our service

WHAT APPLIANCE REPAIR SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
We will repair any major appliance and any major brand for: 
- Refrigerators repair 
- Stove repair 
- Oven repair 
- Washing Machine repair 
- Dryer repair 
- Dishwasher repair 
- Microwave repair

We repair all makes and models, we even repair Miele appliances! Other brands we service regularly: Frigidaire, Simmons, Samsung, LG, GE, Kenmore, Thermadore, Whirlpool, Kenmore, Maytag, Moffat, Dacor, Fisher and Paykel, Thermador, Electrolux, Bosch, Sub Zero, Amana, Jenn-Air, Wolf, AEG, Magic Chef, Viking, Blomberg, Admiral, Westing House, Ariston, MagicChef, Inglis - IF THE Brand is not on the list WE CAN DO IT (we just missed it).

WHAT PLUMBING SERVICES DO WE OFFER?
- Toilet repair 
- Drain cleaning
- Plumbing repairs
- New installations (sinks, toilets, showers) 
- Water pumps
- Water heaters
- Frozen pipes
- Re-piping
- Burst Pipes
- Leak Detection 
- Inspections

We service Toronto and all surrounding areas. That includes: Toronto, Whitby, Oshawa, Pickering, Scarborough, Markham, Aurora, Newmarket, Brampton, Bradford, Oakville, Mississauga, Etobicoke, North York, East York, GTA, Burlington, Barrie, Innisfil and all of the cities that surround the cities listed


We look forward to servicing your appliance and plumbing HVAC and electrical repair needs!

profile:
Pegasus Appliance Repair is a locally owned Hamilton area appliance repair company that’s here to help you when you need us most.

Our number one objective is getting your appliances fixed as quickly and as affordably as possible so that you can go back to living your life.

We are here to help throughout the COVID-19 health crisis. 
Pegasus Appliance Repair remains available for service calls across the 7 days a week across the Greater Hamilton region.
Your safety is our top priority, so we continue to follow provincial health guidelines. 
When we arrive at your home, we'll practice physical distancing, wash our hands on arrival, and disinfect any surfaces we touch. 
We wish everyone nothing but the best health.

profile:
Welcome to Sub Zero Fridge Repair in Toronto. We have over 20 years of experience in service related to maintenance, troubleshooting and repairing of SubZero Appliances such as Refrigerator, Fridge, Freezer, Coolers, Ice Makers, Compressors, Evaporator Coils, Condenser Fan Motors and Sub Zero Wine Cooler. May it be commercial or residential appliances repairing-we provide astonishing service in both areas.
 
We do Sub Zero Refrigerator, Fridge, Freezer, Wine Coolers Repair and Service for the following Series: 200, 300, 400, 500, 600, 700 and all other Series & Models.
 
We provide service all across GTA area: Toronto, Etobicoke, Scarborough, North York, Richmond Hill, Mississauga, Brampton, Vaughan, Thornhill, Woodbridge, Markham, Pickering, King City, Nobleton, Schomberg, Oakville, Milton, Hamilton, Ajax, Oshawa, Niagara Falls, Bolton, Maple, Burlington, Stouffville, Whitby, Halton Hills, Pottageville, Humber Grove, Brookville, Caledon, Aurora, Barrie, New Market, Gwillimbury, Port Perry.
